channel.title: [508] bulby/tokkul-scape based, almost got npc requirements! just need some help

item.title: [508] bulby/tokkul-scape based, almost got npc requirements! just need some help
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

Try it like this…

if((n.npcType == 1648 && n.isDead == true)) {
if(p.skillLvl[18] >= 5)
p.addSkillXP(80*p.skillLvl[18], 18);
else
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “You need level 5 Slayer to slay this monster.”);
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: [508] bulby/tokkul-scape based, almost got npc requirements! just need some help

item.title: [508] bulby/tokkul-scape based, almost got npc requirements! just need some help
item.dc:creator: @sponge_bong sponge bong
item.description:
@sponge_bong wrote:

ok listen. the npc gives slayer exp and all when it dies. but im having problems making the actual requirements. i would think this would work, but it doesnt at all. but i have no errors still get exp just doesnt say i need 5 slayer.

if(n.isDead == true) { if((n.npcType == 1648)) { if(p.skillLvl[18] < 5) p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You need level 5 Slayer to slay this monster."); p.addSkillXP(80*p.skillLvl[18], 18); } } please help its the last slaying thing i need help with.
the message “You need level 5 Slayer to slay this monster.” doesnt pop up either.
